text: Ariano Suassuna (; June 16, 1927 – July 23, 2014) was a Brazilian playwright and author. He is in the "Movimento Armorial". He founded the Student Theater at Federal University of Pernambuco. Ariano SuassunaAriano Suassuna, regional writer of the northwest He is the author of, among other works, the "Auto da Compadecida" and "A Pedra do Reino". Suassuna died from cardiac arrest in Recife, Pernambuco, Brazil, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== *IMDB *Icaro Brazil *Academia's site (In Portuguese) *"ARIANO SUASSUNA - ENTREVISTA" Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brazilian playwrights Category:People from Paraíba
